title: Riot Mystery Gift
body:
Starting off I have a total of 56 different champs out of these 56 only 6 of them have skins. After getting the mystery skin it ended being a skin for a champ that already has a skin and technically was the skin I spent the most rp on. It is annoying for this to happen but truly I am still grateful for the gift however I know I will never use this skin ever. I would rather repack this skin as a mystery gift and give it away to someone then to keep it and never use it. Has something similar happened to anyone else?
Please no hate comments
Edit: Forgot to add that I got Atlantean Fizz having already owned Tundra (don't start another one of those Atlantean v Tundra fights again)

replies.body:
I got Professor Ryze.

I hate Ryze.
